00028 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( MIMEValueTest );
00029 
00030 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_parameter;
00031 
00032 void MIMEValueTest::setUp()
00033 {
00034         int32_t value;
00035         value = 76406;
00036         memset(arr, 0, 10);
00037         memcpy(arr, &value, 4);
00038         mimeValue = new MIMEValue(arr, 10);
00039 }
00040 
00041 void MIMEValueTest::tearDown()
00042 {
00043         delete mimeValue;
00044 }
00045 
00046 void MIMEValueTest::CreationTest()
00047 {
00048         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mimeValue);
00049 }
00050 
00051 void MIMEValueTest::SizeTest()
00052 {
00053         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mimeValue->Size() == 10);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void MIMEValueTest::GetValueTest()
00057 {
00058         u_int32_t size;
00059         const void* p = mimeValue->GetValue(size);
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(p, arr, 10) == 0);
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(size == 10);
00062 }
00063 
00064 void MIMEValueTest::CopyConstructorTest()
00065 {
00066         MIMEValue newValue(*mimeValue);
00067         u_int32_t size1, size2;
00068         const void* p1 = mimeValue->GetValue(size1);
00069         const void* p2 = newValue.GetValue(size2);
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(p1, p2, size1) == 0);
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(size2 == 10);
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(mimeValue->GetValue(size1), newValue.GetValue(size2), size1) == 0);
00073 }
00074 
00075 void MIMEValueTest::AssignmentOperatorTest()
00076 {
00077         char x[5];
00078         memset(x, 0, 5);
00079         x[0] = 4;
00080         MIMEValue v(x, 5);
00081         
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(v = *mimeValue);
00083         
00084         u_int32_t size;
00085         const void* p = v.GetValue(size);
00086 
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(size == 10);
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(p, arr, 10) == 0);
00089 }
00090 
00091 void MIMEValueTest::OperatorEqualsTest()
00092 {
00093         MIMEValue v(*mimeValue);
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(v == *mimeValue);
00095 }
00096 
00097 void MIMEValueTest::OperatorNotEqualsTest()
00098 {
00099         char x[5];
00100         memset(x, 0, 5);
00101         x[0] = 4;
00102         MIMEValue v(x, 5);
00103 
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(v != *mimeValue);
00105 }
00106 
00107 void MIMEValueTest::SetValueTest()
00108 {
00109         int32_t value;
00110         value = 76406;
00111         memset(arr, 0, 10);
00112         memcpy(arr, &value, 4);
00113 
00114         MIMEValue v;
00115         v.SetValue(arr, 10);
00116 
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(v == *mimeValue);
00118 }
